issue.title: www.baidu.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.baidu.com/s?wd=%E5%8F%91%E6%98%8E%E5%85%AC%E5%BC%80%E6%98%AF%E5%8F%91%E6%98%8E%E4%B8%93%E5%88%A9%E5%90%97&rsf=101633403&rsp=4&f=1&rs_src=0&rsv_pq=855969430000a9c8&rsv_t=ef42ccS8c%2FzB7CiAEGMT68+VeLzUbRj4+9VOzxjXdL%2FDyNpwvevIFZGAWkg&rsv_dl=brs_28338_5](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.baidu.com%2Fs%3Fwd%3D%25E5%258F%2591%25E6%2598%258E%25E5%2585%25AC%25E5%25BC%2580%25E6%2598%25AF%25E5%258F%2591%25E6%2598%258E%25E4%25B8%2593%25E5%2588%25A9%25E5%2590%2597%26rsf%3D101633403%26rsp%3D4%26f%3D1%26rs_src%3D0%26rsv_pq%3D855969430000a9c8%26rsv_t%3Def42ccS8c%252FzB7CiAEGMT68%2BVeLzUbRj4%2B9VOzxjXdL%252FDyNpwvevIFZGAWkg%26rsv_dl%3Dbrs_28338_5) ### Comment > 网页检测到adguard正在工作，屏蔽了adguard操作窗口，导致在选择待屏蔽广告后无法点击确定。 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.net/sitereports/mp8u7xkxtkgswwkwcscck84ocgo0wg0nmbca8lhaus.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v2.8.6 System version: | `windows 10` Browser: | Yandex 浏览器 Tracking protection: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Language-specific:
AdGuard Japanese,
Official Polish filters for AdBlock, uBlock Origin & AdGuard,
Polish GDPR-Cookies Filters Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Other extensions used: | `无` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=ext&product_version=2.8.6&system_version=windows+10&browser=yandex&browser_detail=YaBrowser&filters=2.7.216.217&browsing_security.enabled=false&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: www.myrunningman.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.myrunningman.com/ep/288](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.myrunningman.com%2Fep%2F288) ### Comment > I can't block the ads on the screen even if I try "Block an Element" from this extension because it just assumes the whole screen is one element, even if there are 2 separate pop-up ads on the screen. It also takes me directly to a porn website when I click anything for the first time. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/eblgvo0pu9cs84ook00k0oo0c4g8ooclj97g8day5w.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v1.11.24 Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist

Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Self-destructing first-party cookies (4320)

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt` Filters: | Ad blocking:

AdGuard Mobile Ads

AdGuard Widgets,

AdGuard Popups,
Adblock Warning Removal List

Security:

Other:

Language-specific:
AdGuard French,
AdGuard Russian Custom filters: | `https://gitflic.ru/project/magnolia1234/bypass-paywalls-clean-filters/blob/raw?file=bpc-paywall-filter.txt`,
`https://raw.githubusercontent.com/reek/anti-adblock-killer/master/anti-adblock-killer-filters.txt` Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | disabled ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=and&product_version=4.12.1&system_version=Android+12&browser=firefox+mobile&filters=16.20.15.208.18.22.3.4.14.1.19.2.251.207.11.17&custom_filters=https%253A%252F%252Fgitflic.ru%252Fproject%252Fmagnolia1234%252Fbypass-paywalls-clean-filters%252Fblob%252Fraw%253Ffile%253Dbpc-paywall-filter.txt%252Chttps%253A%252F%252Fraw.githubusercontent.com%252Freek%252Fanti-adblock-killer%252Fmaster%252Fanti-adblock-killer-filters.txt&dns_servers=https%3A%2F%2Fdns.adguard-dns.com%2Fdns-query&android.mode=VPN&android.system_root=false&dns.filters=https%253A%252F%252Ffilters.adtidy.org%252Fandroid%252Ffilters%252F15_optimized.txt&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&https.filtering=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.location=false&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.first_party_cookies=4320&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&license_type=paid&dns.timeout=5000)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
